title: Mouthpiece

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Rolodex- (Night) Target two players, transporting them.
Hang Up!- (Night) [Cheat] Choose a player. The next night, you may deal a Basic Attack to any player who voted for your initially chosen player during the day.
Attributes:
-Wire Cut! (Passive)- If a player attempts to attack you and fails for any reason, you will know and may use a Cheat at any time over the next Day/Night phase to deal an Instant Astral Basic Attack to them.

desc:
Post 4014
*Seems like the line was cut, darling.*
